Functions
Bitfield
Bitfield()

Constructs Bitfield object with value 0

Bitfield
Bitfield(
uint64 val
) : m_value(val)

Constructs Bitfield object with indicated value

Parameters
val
uint64

uint64 bitfield value

~Bitfield
virtual ~Bitfield()

Default destructor for the Bitfield object

Variables
m_value
uint64 m_value

The bitfield value

Functions
value
uint64 value() const

Gets or sets the entire underlying bitfield value

get
uint64 get(
uint64 mask,
bool shiftToLsb = true
) const

Gets the value of only the bits masked by the indicated mask.

Parameters
mask
uint64

uint64 indicating which bits to evaluate

shiftToLsb
bool

true: return the masked bits shifted all the way to the right, false: return the masked bits in their original position

Returns
uint64

the masked value

set
void set(
uint64 mask,
uint64 value,
bool shiftRequired = true
)

Sets the provided value to the position indicated by the indicated mask

Parameters
mask
uint64

uint64 indicating the position to place the value

value
uint64

uint64 value to set

shiftRequired
bool

true: provided value needs to be shifted to the masked position before being set, false: provided value already in the correct position within the bitfield

clear
void clear(
uint64 mask
)

Sets all bits under the indicated mask to 0.

Parameters
mask
uint64

uint64 mask indicating the position of the bits to clear
